definitions.title: verb.
definitions.body: get by trade, trade (NH [[כִּירָה]] act of buying, purchase (so ‘ in den Küstenländern, ’ Levy:NWB ii. 323 f.); Ar. karay let for hire);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. sf. [[וׇאֶכְּרֶהָ]] Ho 3:2 (d. f. dirim., si vera punctat., Ges:§ 20. 2, b; but cf. We); 3 mpl. [[יִכְרוּ]] Job 40:30; 2 mpl. [[תִּכְרוּ]] De 2:6, Job 6:27; —get by trade, buy, c. acc. Ho 3:2, De 2:6; sq. -[[עַל]] trade in, make trade of Job 6:27, Job 41:6.
